revised_title: Hemisection and Degeneration in the Spinal Cord: A Study of Vaso-Motor Disturbances and Long Tract Fibers
tldr: The author discusses the vaso-motor disturbances and degenerations in the spinal cord following a hemisection. They also explore the origin and course of long and short tract fibers in the spinal cord. These findings contribute to the understanding of the effects of spinal cord injuries on the body and the nervous system.
